org.elasticsearch.index.analysis

Interface MultiTermAwareComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArabicNormalizationFilterFactory, ASCIIFoldingTokenFilterFactory, CJKWidthFilterFactory, DecimalDigitFilterFactory, ElisionTokenFilterFactory, GermanNormalizationFilterFactory, HindiNormalizationFilterFactory, IndicNormalizationFilterFactory, LowerCaseTokenFilterFactory, LowerCaseTokenizerFactory, MappingCharFilterFactory, PersianNormalizationFilterFactory, ScandinavianFoldingFilterFactory, ScandinavianNormalizationFilterFactory, SerbianNormalizationFilterFactory, SoraniNormalizationFilterFactory, UpperCaseTokenFilterFactory

    public interface MultiTermAwareComponent
    Elasticsearch counterpart of MultiTermAwareComponent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getMultiTermComponent()
      Returns an analysis component to handle analysis if multi-term queries.

    • Method Detail

      • getMultiTermComponent

        java.lang.Object getMultiTermComponent()
        Returns an analysis component to handle analysis if multi-term queries. The returned component must be a TokenizerFactory, TokenFilterFactory or CharFilterFactory.
